Kourouma bụ obodo nta na ime obodo dị na Cercle of Sikasso na mpaghara Sikasso nke ndịda Mali
Obodo a na-ekpuchi mpaghara nke square kilomita 293 ma gụnyere obodo nta 10
Na ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 2009, ọnụ aguru nwere mmadụ 11,234
Obodo nta dị na Kourouma, isi obodo nke obodo ahụ, dị kilomita 81 n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Sikasso.
